name: VARAIYA KRISHI BAGVANI EVAM JAN KALYAN SAMITI AMOL(PATHA)
briefDescription: Varaiya krishi bagvani evam jan kalian samiti amol patha  is  a  non-governmental  organisation  (NGO)   established  in the  year  2007-08  for  the  benefit  of  mankind  especially for the  economically and  socially  backward  rural  people.  Over  the  past  7 years,  we  have  worked to  identify  and  meet  the needs  and  aspirations  of  the  rural  poor  through  participatory  approaches  for  development in 65 villages of Shivpuri and Sheopur districts selected Block in Madhaya Pradesh state.
